name: ELECTROPHYSIOLOGY ADVOCACY FOUNDATION (EPAF)
description: Advocacy for cardiac electrophysiologists and patients access to quality care.
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid implemented 25-33% reimbursement cuts in 2022 for ablation services. They are proposing to add an additional 10-20% cut effective 2023 for CPT codes: 93653-93657.
The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid implemented 25-33% reimbursement cuts in 2022 for ablation services. They are proposing to add an additional 10-20% cut effective 2023 for CPT codes: 93653-93657.
Advocacy regarding CMS reimbursement cuts for ablation services.
